narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Partners in Opportunities, Inc. is a Residential Treatment Facility, Intellectual and/or Developmental Disabilities provider based in South Bend, IN. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $26.0M in Medicaid payments across 14K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $26.0M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
